form.slack_bot_token: <input type="password" name="slack_bot_token" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-red-300 shadow-sm focus:border-red-500 focus:ring-red-500" placeholder="xoxb-..." id="id_slack_bot_token">
form.slack_channel_id: <input type="text" name="slack_channel_id" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" placeholder="Channel ID or URL" id="id_slack_channel_id">
form.github_access_token: <input type="password" name="github_access_token" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-red-300 shadow-sm focus:border-red-500 focus:ring-red-500" placeholder="ghp_..." id="id_github_access_token">
form.github_repository_owner: <input type="text" name="github_repository_owner" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" placeholder="owner/organization" id="id_github_repository_owner">
form.github_repository_name: <input type="text" name="github_repository_name" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-red-300 shadow-sm focus:border-red-500 focus:ring-red-500" placeholder="repository-name" id="id_github_repository_name">
slack_bot_token_errors: Invalid token format. Bot tokens should start with 'xoxb-'.
github_access_token_errors: Invalid token format. GitHub tokens should start with 'ghp_'.
github_repository_name_errors: This field is required when GitHub access token is provided.
